mapper.select:
select count(*) from review r, users u where r.userNo = u.userNo
and r.reviewTitle || u.nickname like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%'
select cafeNo, cafeName from cafe where (sidodetail like '%' || #{sido} || '%' OR sido like '%' || #{sido} || '%')
select themeNo, themename from theme where cafeNo = #{cafeNo}

select r.reviewno, r.userNo, r.reviewtitle, u.nickname, r.reviewhit, to_char(r.reviewregdate, 'yy-mm-dd') reviewregdate, r.reviewcontent, r.reviewhints, r.reviewClear, r.recTime, r.memberNum, r.reviewImg, t.themeName, r.rating from review r, users u, theme t where r.userNo = u.userNo and r.themeNo = t.themeNo and r.reviewno = #{reviewno}

select rc.commentno, u.nickname, rc.commentContent, to_char(rc.commentDate, 'yy-mm-dd') commentDate from review r, users u, reviewcomment rc where rc.userNo = u.userNo and rc.reviewNo = r.reviewNo and rc.commentNo = #{commentNo}

select rc.commentno, u.nickname, rc.commentContent, to_char(rc.commentDate, 'yy-mm-dd') commentDate, rc.reviewNo from review r, users u, reviewcomment rc where rc.userNo = u.userNo and r.reviewNo = rc.reviewNo and rc.reviewno = #{reviewNo} order by rc.commentNo desc

select count(*) from freeboard b, users u where b.userNo = u.userNo
and b.boardTitle || u.nickname like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%'

select b.boardno, b.userNo, b.boardtitle, u.nickname, b.boardhit, to_char(b.regdate, 'yy-mm-dd') regdate, b.boardcontent, b.boardImg from freeboard b, users u where b.userNo = u.userNo and b.boardno = #{boardno}

select f.boardno, f.userNo, f.boardtitle, u.nickname, f.boardhit, to_char(f.regdate, 'yy-mm-dd') regdate, f.boardContent, f.boardImg from freeboard f, users u where f.userNo = u.userNo and f.boardno = #{boardNo}
